awd_titl_txt: Chapel Hill Workshop on Geometry for Molecular Visualizationand Characterization, March 3, 1990, Chapel Hill, NC
awd_abstract_narration: The Workshop on Geometry for Molecular Visualization and                        Characterization will bring together software developers and                    biochemists to discuss the questions, "What computer-generated                  geometric representations of molecular structures might be useful               for future work by the biochemical community?" and "What software               tools might facilitate the specification of these new geometric                 representations by the biochemist?"                                                                                                                             The workshop will consist of presentations by participants of work-             in-progress and proposed future work.  In addition, round-table                 discussions to assess the state-of-the-art in this area and future              directions will be held.

inst.inst_name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
